title: PRAYER – THE BREATH OF A SPIRITUAL MAN

devotion.label: INSIGHT / REFLECTION
devotion.text:
A lifeless man never breathes  his breath has departed, and life has ceased. A man breathes because he is alive. Think about this in your spiritual life: a spiritual man’s life is not in the breath of his nostrils but in his prayer.

Prayer is the breathing of the soul. A praying Christian never forgets to pray; it becomes as natural to him as breathing. Through prayer, he draws the life-giving air of the Holy Spirit, who indwells in him. The Holy Spirit becomes his life-force, comforter, and guide. Every act and thought is engraved by the Almighty within him.

When the Holy Spirit breathes through a man, his words, his work, and his worship all carry divine fragrance. He lives not by his own strength but through this continual spiritual breathing.

God is at work in him shaping, empowering, and revealing wonders. Are you breathing the breath of Christ’s Spirit today?

quote.label: TODAY'S QUOTE
quote.text: “To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.”..Martin Luther

prayer.label: PRAYER
prayer.text: Lord, breathe into me Your Spirit anew today. Let my every breath be a prayer, and my life a testimony of Your presence within me. Amen.

conclusion.label: A WORD TO YOU
text: May your soul breathe heaven’s air today.
May prayer become your constant rhythm of life.

recommended_book.label: RECOMMENDED BOOK
recommended_book.title: “THE NECESSITY OF PRAYER,”
recommended_book.author: E.M.BOUNDS
recommended_book.quote: The pastor who succeeds in changing his people from a prayerless to a prayerful people, has done a greater work than did Augustus in changing a city from wood to marble.
